data.name: MILF Conditioning
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925210/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1844230/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

â—†About this game

You happened to save a MILF, and she happened to be the wife of your landlord, yet she had a weak character that didn't match her statusâ€”she couldn't refuse others. Having learnt about that, how would you take advantage of that and sleep with the beautiful landlady?

â—†Game Features

â—‡Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment settings for free navigation through the HCGs

â—‡Stress-free operationâ€”fast text skipping system

â—†Story

I was worried about not being able to pay the rent to the landlord, when I inadvertently rescued the landlord's wife, Sophia.

"I...I'm sorry, I...I didn't mean to cause you any trouble..." Sophia sobbed timidly.
"What do you want?" The landlord glanced at you condescendingly.

Your acts of kindness were rewarded not with gratitude but with the contempt of those who thought they were in high status.
Flashes of the landlady's cowardice and the landlord Okamoto's condescension ran through your head.

The memory of the landlady's huge breasts, her silvery hair and her deer-like eyes made you swallow.
The corners of your mouth lifted in a teasing smile, a smile that was a little cruel.
Sofia cowered with tears in her eyes in the face of the man who demanded carnal service in return for his rescue.
No more pretending! Showdown! I'm a bad guy~

â—†Gameplay Instruction

At the beginning of the game, you have three opportunities to act each day, and a fixed amount of money will be spent each day.
[Conditioning] can increase Sophia's slavery value
[Work] can increase money
[Go out] can trigger new storylines or spend money to regain stamina

Sophia's slavery value is necessary to trigger [Sex Event], but some of the game's CGs need to be combined with other conditions such as items and days, etc. in order to unlock. [Sex Event] with Sophia's daughter can be triggered after opening the 3rd new job, so you should work hard~
Some of the stories need to be triggered during the [Evening] time.

data.supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
